00029 
00030 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N S ____________________________________________
00031 U16 g_regulation_period = 0;  
00032 U16 motor_speed = 0;          
00033 extern Bool g_tick;           //generated by mc_drv.c Used for sampling time
00034 extern Bool overcurrent;
00035 
00036 
00042 void main(void)
00043 {
00044 
00045   // init motor
00046   mc_init();  // launch initialization of the motor application
00047   
00048   // Initialyze the communication system for External Command through Uart
00049   ushell_task_init();
00050 
00051   // Start the motor
00052   mci_set_ref_speed(0);
00053   mci_run();
00054 //  mc_set_speed_loop(); // uncomment to activate the speed regulation loop
00055   
00056   while(1)
00057   {
00058     // Launch regulation loop
00059     // Timer 1 generate an IT (g_tick) all 250us
00060     // Sampling period = n * 250us
00061     if (g_tick == TRUE)
00062     {
00063       g_tick = FALSE;
00064 
00065       // Get Current and potentiometer value
00066       mc_ADC_Scheduler();
00067 
00068       g_regulation_period += 1;
00069       if ( g_regulation_period >= 40 ) //n * 250us = Te
00070       {
00071         g_regulation_period = 0;
00072 
00073         if (ushell_active == FALSE)
00074         {
00075           // Set User Speed Command with potentiometer
00076           mci_set_ref_speed(mc_get_potentiometer_value());
00077         }
00078         mc_regulation_loop(); // launch regulation loop
00079       }
00080       mc_duty_cycle(mc_get_duty_cycle());
00081       ushell_task();
00082       mc_inrush_task();       // manage the inrush current
00083 
00084     }
00085     if (overcurrent==0)
00086     {
00087       Set_PC7();
00088     }
00089     else
00090     {
00091       Clear_PC7();
00092     }
00093 
00094   }
00095 }
